Locations.name: Rooting Marshlands
Locations.description: A fog-filled swamp where the ground shifts beneath your feet.

Locations.name: Forsaken Town
Locations.description: Crumbling houses line empty streets where shadows move without bodies.

Locations.name: Town Hall
Locations.description: A ruined building overflowing with dark and unstable magic.

Locations.name: The Endless Windmill
Locations.description: An old windmill that turns endlessly without wind, driven by magic.

Locations.name: Sunny Glade
Locations.description: A peaceful clearing filled with warm light, offering rest and safety.

Locations.name: Whispering Woods
Locations.description: A dense forest where trees whisper lies and half-truths.

Locations.name: Frozen Peaks
Locations.description: Snow-covered mountains where ancient magic sleeps in the ice.

Locations.name: Ancient Oak of Wisdom
Locations.description: A massive, sentient oak guarding ancient knowledge and paths.

Locations.name: Caverns of Oblivion
Locations.description: A dark underground maze where light is the only protection from deadly falls.

Locations.name: Druidic Star Circle
Locations.description: A sacred stone circle awaiting powerful artifacts to break the curse.

Items.name: Mysterious Amulet
Items.description: An ancient amulet pulsing with dark energy. It feels alive in your hands.

Items.name: Rusty Key
Items.description: An old key covered in rust. It might open something important in the Town Hall.

Items.name: Curse Scroll
Items.description: A scroll containing the details of the curse that plagues these lands.

Items.name: Healing Herbs
Items.description: Fresh herbs that glow with a soft green light. They can restore health and vitality.

Items.name: Light Crystal
Items.description: A radiant crystal that pierces through darkness. Essential for navigating the Caverns.

Items.name: Spirit Flask
Items.description: A sealed flask containing the essence of a forest spirit. Handle with care.

Items.name: Ice Shard
Items.description: A fragment of eternal ice that never melts. It hums with frozen magic.

Items.name: Wisdom Seed
Items.description: A seed from the Ancient Oak, containing centuries of knowledge.

Items.name: Obsidian Blade
Items.description: A jet-black blade forged from volcanic glass and dark magic.

Items.name: First Star Key
Items.description: One of three keys needed to activate the Star Circle and break the curse.

Items.name: Second Star Key
Items.description: The second key for the Star Circle. Its surface reflects distant stars.

Items.name: Third Star Key
Items.description: The final key needed to complete the ritual at the Star Circle.

Characters.name: Elder Marius
Characters.description: An old wanderer who knows the history of the curse. 'The land weeps for what was lost. Find the three Star Keys to break the cycle.'

Characters.name: Ghost Merchant
Characters.description: A spectral trader trapped between worlds. 'I have what you seek, but everything has a price in this cursed place.'

Characters.name: Windmill Keeper
Characters.description: A mysterious figure who maintains the endless windmill. 'The winds remember everything. They whisper of three keys scattered across the land.'

Characters.name: Spirit of Light
Characters.description: A benevolent entity that dwells in the Sunny Glade. 'Take this crystal, traveler. You'll need it in the darkness below.'

Characters.name: Forest Whisperer
Characters.description: A cryptic being who speaks in riddles. 'Truth and lies dance together here. One flask holds clarity, another holds doom.'

Characters.name: Ice Guardian
Characters.description: An ancient protector of the Frozen Peaks. 'The First Star Key lies frozen in my domain. Prove your worth to claim it.'

Characters.name: The Ancient Oak
Characters.description: The sentient tree itself speaks with a voice like rustling leaves. 'I have watched for centuries. The Second Key rests in my roots.'

Characters.name: Shadow Wraith
Characters.description: A dangerous entity lurking in the Caverns. 'The Third Key is mine! Leave now or face oblivion!'

Characters.name: Druid Spirit
Characters.description: The ghostly remnant of the last druid. 'Place the three Star Keys upon the altar. Only then can the curse be broken.'
